title: Bloomberg's Condon on China Asking Timing of Fed Hikes (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Condon on China Asking Timing of Fed Hikes (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Chris Condon, Federal Reserve reporter for Bloomberg News, on Fed news: China's plan to ask the US on timing of a Fed rate hike; using AI in setting monetary policy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
